Evidence Pro: Hello Esteemed Debaters and Observers Alike, My name is arrowjaw, and today I am presenting a debate topic I wish to argue with an opponent. This debate has been created in all seriousness and I expect it to be argued thus. Please only accept this debate if you wish to debate seriously, no trolls, jokers, or fakers. Rules and Regulations: No Ad Hominem: No attacking the moral, mental, or physical intentions or state of being of an opponent. No Kritiks Respect all debaters, commenters, and others All unsupported evidence can and may be nullified: Provide citations, support, websites, etc... Forfeiting a single round for personal reason is excepted, just continue on, any more than one is considered an actual loss. Structure of the Round: Round 1: Opening Statements, Words of Acceptance, Thanks, etc... Round 2: Opening Arguments, Case Construction [Affirmative (Me) goes first) Round 3: Rebuttal To Opponents Cases Round 4: Rebuttals Round 5: Last Rebuttals, Closing Case Construction, and Closing Words A Note to the Voters/Judges: Do not vote for the side you agree with, but vote for the side that either convinced you or upheld their arguments the most. Thank you for either judging the round, actually debating it, or just observing.
